mainData.title: Live Master Class on Big Data

header.title: Live Master Class on Big Data
header.desc: For Professionals with 1+ years Working Exp

feature.title: Live Master Class on Big Data
feature.p1: Fulfill your learning goals and get expert assistance.
feature.p2: Get 100% live sessions led by Data Science experts.
feature.p3: Attend the training and get acknowledged IBM certification.

profile.list1: 4+ years of experience in Big Data

whyUs.title: You will learn about
whyUs.l3: Difference between Traditional and Hadoop distributed systems
whyUs.l4: Workflow and Fault tolerance in Hadoop
whyUs.l5: Understanding different modes of a Hadoop cluster
whyUs.l6: Different data ingestion techniques in Hadoop
whyUs.l7: Building Sqoop automation jobs for extracting MySQL tables

whoCan.title: This masterclass is for
whoCan.para1: Data Scientist aspirants who are aiming to accelerate their respective careers by upskilling with Data Science.
whoCan.para2: Professionals, irrespective of their domains, who have great enthusiasm to make a career transition into Data Science.
whoCan.para3: Learnbay Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.
